facts.text: Adidas was the kit manufacturer for Minnesota United from 2017 to 2020.
Target was the shirt sponsor for Minnesota United from 2017 to 2020.
Bell Bank became the sleeve sponsor for Minnesota United starting in 2020.
Allianz was the sleeve sponsor for Minnesota United from 2023 to 2024.
NutriSource Finley's will be the sleeve sponsor for Minnesota United starting in 2025.
Alec Smir wears the number 1 and plays as a goalkeeper (GK) for Minnesota United.
Nicol√°s Romero, from Argentina, wears the number 5 and plays as a defender (DF) for Minnesota United.
Jeong Sang-bin, from South Korea, wears the number 7 and plays as a forward (FW) for Minnesota United.
Robin Lod, from Finland, wears the number 17 and plays as a midfielder (MF) for Minnesota United.
Christian Ramirez was the top goalscorer for Minnesota United in 2017 with 14 goals.
Darwin Quintero was the top goalscorer for Minnesota United in both 2018 and 2019, with 11 and 16 goals respectively.
Minnesota United finished 9th in the conference and 19th overall in their 2017 MLS season.
The team's highest league position came in 2019, finishing 4th in the conference and 7th overall.
Minnesota United reached the semifinals of the MLS is Back Tournament in 2020.
Bongokuhle Hlongwane was the top goalscorer for Minnesota United in 2023 with 17 goals.
Minnesota United's average attendance was 20,538 in their 2017 MLS season.
Eric Ramsay is the head coach of Minnesota United.
Minnesota United played against Istra in a friendly match on February 3, 2017, with the game ending in a 1-1 draw.
The team lost 1-2 to Saprissa in a friendly match on July 11, 2018.
Minnesota United defeated Hertha Berlin 1-0 in a friendly match at Allianz Field on May 22, 2019.
Minnesota United lost to Aston Villa 0-3 in a friendly match at Allianz Field on July 17, 2019.
Minnesota United and Pachuca played to a 2-2 draw in a friendly match at Allianz Field on September 7, 2019.
Minnesota United and Viking ended in a 2-2 draw in a friendly match at Providence Park on February 19, 2022.
Minnesota United won against Paderborn 07 with a score of 4-3 in a friendly match at Allianz Field on June 11, 2022.
Minnesota United secured a 4-0 victory over Everton in a friendly match at Allianz Field on July 20, 2022.
Minnesota United defeated Kaiserslautern 2-1 in a friendly match at Allianz Field on June 28, 2023.
Minnesota United won 4-0 against Puebla in a Leagues Cup match at Allianz Field on July 23, 2023.
Minnesota United advanced with a 2-2 (penalties) win against Deportivo Toluca in a Leagues Cup match at Allianz Field on August 8, 2023.
Minnesota United beat St Patrick's Athletic 1-0 in a friendly match at Allianz Field on March 20, 2024.
Minnesota United secured a 1-0 victory over Club Necaxa in a Leagues Cup match at Allianz Field on July 30, 2024.
Minnesota United and Holstein Kiel played to a 0-0 draw in a friendly match at Allianz Field on July 7, 2025.
